tit.e: Candy-wrap (keyhole shape with one more handle) shape mound.
Candy-wrap (keyhole shape with one more handle) Shape Barrows
tit.cmt: ピリオド削除しました。
tit.e: Candy-wrap (keyhole shape with one more handle) Shape Barrows

sen.j: 双方中円墳（そうほうちゅうえんふん）とは、古墳の形のひとつ。
sen.e: Candy-wrap refers to one of the form of tumulus.
Candy-wrap shape barrow refers to one of the form of tumulus.
Candy-wrap shape barrow refers to one of the form of tumulus.

sen.j: 円丘の両側に方形の突出部を持ち、比較的古墳時代前期に見られる。
sen.e: They have square juts on both sides of Enkyu (round mausoleum) and were seen relatively during the early Kofun period (tumulus period).
They have square juts on both sides of a round hill and were seen relatively during the early Kofun period (tumulus period).
They have square juts on both sides of a round hill and were seen relatively during the early Kofun period (tumulus period).

tit.cmt: ピリオド削除しました。
